mapper.update: UPDATE cb_vouchers_info set update_time = now(), status = '2', user_member_code = #{memberCode}, use_order_id = #{orderId}, use_time = now() where vouchers_id = #{vouchersId}
UPDATE cb_vouchers_info set update_time = now(), status = '0', user_member_code = null, use_time = null where vouchers_id = #{vouchersId}

UPDATE cb_vouchers_info
update_time = SYSDATE(),
vouchers_money = #{vouchersMoney},
vouchers_use_money = #{vouchersUseMoney},
vouchers_res_money = #{vouchersResMoney},
member_code = #{memberCode},
send_active_id = #{sendActiveId},
send_time = #{sendTime},
status = #{status},
use_time = #{useTime},
AND client_id = #{clientId}
AND active_id = #{activeId}
AND id = #{id}

UPDATE cb_vouchers_info
client_id = #{clientId},
update_time = SYSDATE(),
active_id = #{activeId},
vouchers_id = #{vouchersId},
vouchers_money = #{vouchersMoney},
vouchers_use_money = #{vouchersUseMoney},
vouchers_res_money = #{vouchersResMoney},
member_code = #{memberCode},
send_active_id = #{sendActiveId},
send_time = #{sendTime},
status = #{status},
use_time = #{useTime},
user_member_code = #{userMemberCode},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cb_vouchers_info where status = '0' and member_code = 0 and send_active_id is null and send_time is null and active_id = #{activeId} limit 1

SELECT
FROM cb_vouchers_info where status = '0' and member_code = 0 and send_active_id is null and send_time is null and active_id = #{activeId}

SELECT * FROM cb_vouchers_temporary_info where 1=1
AND active_id = #{vouchersInfo.activeId}

SELECT , a.active_name, a.description, a.expire_end_time, a.expire_start_time from cb_vouchers_info v left join cb_active_base_rule a on v.active_id = a.active_id
where v.member_code = #{memberCode} and v.status = 0 and a.expire_end_time > now()

SELECT , a.active_name, a.description, a.expire_end_time, a.expire_start_time from cb_vouchers_info v left join cb_active_base_rule a on v.active_id = a.active_id
where v.member_code = #{memberCode} and v.status = 0 and a.expire_end_time <= now()

SELECT , a.active_name, a.description, a.expire_end_time, a.expire_start_time from cb_vouchers_info v left join cb_active_base_rule a on v.active_id = a.active_id
where v.member_code = #{memberCode} and (v.status = 1 or v.status = 2)

SELECT * FROM cb_vouchers_info v WHERE v.vouchers_id IN
#{vouchersIdList}
mapper.update: UPDATE cb_vouchers_info set member_code = #{memberCode}, send_time = SYSDATE(), update_time = SYSDATE() WHERE vouchers_id = #{vouchersId}
